episode: I couldn't believe it when they took me on as a full time worker! I had only been there for a month and although I was on a seasonal contract, they asked me to continue beyond as a regular employee

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I couldn't believe it...I started a 3 month temp job and they decided to promote me to a regular full time employee after a month!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing! Congrats on the promotion!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you...I was so shocked I thought I was just average

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You definitely proved yourself! Well done!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just wondered at the time what was coming next beyond more responsibility

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's a big step, but you're ready!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: after 2 more months while I technically was promoted already during my temp contract they promoted me a 2nd time to supervisor!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's incredible!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah I don't know many people who get rapidly promoted like that

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's impressive!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was so wonderful...they even gave me some gifts...and I got company lunch takeout weekly as a perk

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My employees are wonderful. I really don't have to work them too hard because they take initiative on their own

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great to hear!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's hard to get people to listen to you, but I try to be good to them because I've been there

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great approach!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Its rough in the workplace...not everyone is good with working together and/or wants to step on others along the way. I try to encourage us all to be a team and rise together

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a wonderful mindset!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm very lucky I don't think I've had an experience like this at work anywhere. It's usually nonsense

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm glad you found a positive place!
